elements.name: panel1
elements.title: How can the following sentences be formulated respectfully?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: You’ve forgotten to get back to me yet again.
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: It is important to me to be kept informed about progress. Can you please inform me next time?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: You never give a thought to how I’m doing.
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: I would appreciate it if you asked about my well-being.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Why do you always arrive late?
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: I've noticed that you often arrive late. Why is that?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: You exasperate me when you leave the projector on after the meeting.
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: It bothers me when you don't switch off the projector after the meeting. It increases our energy costs unnecessarily and is not ecologically friendly. Please switch off the projector after the next meeting.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: How can the following sentences be formulated respectfully?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: It would be nice if you supported me more often!
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: Please help me with the monthly accounts.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: I would like you to show more commitment!
elements.correctAnswer: Possible answer: Please be proactive in future and let me know when you've finished your work and have free capacity again.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Please understand me!
elements.correctAnswer: This request is not clear. What is meant by “understand”? Consideration, or verbal understanding, or is this a request for support? Possible answer: Please take my point of view into account as service quality is important to me. Next time, come to me if you’re not sure about something before you send the quotation to the customer.
